name: Simple Technical Query
query: What is a transformer architecture in machine learning?
expected_answer: A transformer is a neural network architecture that uses self-attention mechanisms to process sequences of data. It consists of encoder and decoder layers with multi-head attention, positional encoding, and feedforward networks.
description: Basic technical query that should work well with single-turn approach

name: Visual Content Query
query: Show me any performance comparison charts or graphs in the documents and explain what they demonstrate
expected_answer: Performance comparison charts showing different models or systems with metrics like accuracy, speed, or efficiency comparisons.
description: Query requiring visual document analysis - should favor agentic approach with ColPali

name: Business Context Query
query: What are our current project priorities and resource allocations?

description: Business query requiring Salesforce data - tests source selection intelligence

name: Complex Multi-hop Query
query: Based on the performance metrics shown in any charts or graphs, analyze how they relate to our business requirements, and recommend the optimal configuration for our deployment constraints

description: Multi-step reasoning query requiring visual analysis + business context + technical synthesis

name: Progressive Query Refinement

expected_answer: A progressively detailed explanation starting with general neural networks, drilling down to attention mechanisms, and providing mathematical details.
description: Multi-turn query that should benefit significantly from agentic reasoning and memory

name: Cross-Source Intelligence

name: Visual + Technical Integration
